[The Torus; Torus Restaurant]
The glory of the endless expanse of starry space is revealed here through the
transparent dome over this small but elegant restaurant. A spiral staircase in
the center of the restaurant leads down to the main level of the station, and
luxurious black carpeting covers the floor, extending outward to a long
silver-trimmed black plasteel bar encircling the room. Cushioned black leather
bar stools are arranged along the bar, and on the other side is a black plasteel
waiter droid which moves with quiet efficiency to fill customers' orders. A
two-meter-high wall of shiny black plasteel around the outside of the bar
contains notices and a few other photographs and mementos. You see a framed
photo of several pilots gleefully kicking a downed Outsider, a large glossy
framed photo of Benjamin Masterson, a large glossy photo of a beautiful green
planet in space, a small photograph of a pile of burning money, and a large
glossy AFW promotional poster hanging on various walls.
You see a sleek black trash bin, a sleek Torus hyperwave relay interface, a
black and white payphone, a projector, and an ice sculpture of Benjamin
Masterson here.
Lily Kaise is sitting on a padded black stool at the bar.
You can go down.

Lily Kaise
She appears to be 27 years old. She is about five feet and two inches tall and
has fair skin. Her body is thin with attractively curved hips and shapely
calves. She has slender shoulders and slightly larger than average breasts. Her
face is oval and pretty, with a delicate nose and understated chin. Her lips are
lovely and blush pink and occasionally part to reveal a set of pretty teeth.
Beneath a set of arched eyebrows, her eyes are blue-green and almond-shaped. Her
mid-back length, straight hair is pale honey blonde and swept up into a thick
fall of loose curls down her back. She has oval pink fingernails.
A small enameled cerulean blue dragonfly pierces her left earlobe and a small
enameled cerulean blue dragonfly pierces her right earlobe.
 She is wearing a pink synthcotton shipsuit with a flaming star printed on the
collar and a pair of sparkly white leather clogs. She is also wearing an orange
and white blessed prayer bracelet around her wrist, a slender bracelet of tiny
tinkling silver bells around her wrist, a neon purple wrist-mounted chronometer,
a solid silver ring engraved with dragonflies, a delicate ring of silver wire
and small purple amethyst crystals, a metallic gold touch einrophone in a
metallic purple reinforced plastic phone holster, a soft fuchsia Tardick lizard
snuggly labeled 'Asteria', and a Tardick lizard named Asteria perched on her
shoulder. Her head, face, both eyes, both wrists, and both hands are left
uncovered.
She is carrying a crystal glass of chilled Chardonnay in her right hand.

A pair of odd-colored stars, one green and one blue, mark this curious area of
space. The sensors are picking up odd bits of noise that the ship's computer
insists on trying to convert to audio. Once in a while, something that could
almost sound like a word emerges from a burst of static.
The computer reports that in-sector beacons are transmitting the following:
QiCb1|/{#~MYET2ut5;,g~Gr{0]ccz.S^&z#\F`N
Lily Kaise says in a New Earth accent, "Oo shoot sorry."
This area of space is within the green belt of the nearest star, but there are
no life-bearing planets here. Instead there is merely an odd cluster of space
stations of unknown origin.
Lily Kaise stumbles, then falls heavily to the floor.
Lily Kaise says in a New Earth accent, "I'll go back."
The sensor noise is much worse here, with a constant dark, gutteral snarling
sound emanating from the ship's speakers. It almost sounds like a language, but
it's nothing you've ever heard before, and the ship's computer cannot pinpoint a
source.

powered down.

l lily
Lily Kaise
She appears to be 27 years old. She is about five feet and two inches tall and
has fair skin. Her body is thin with attractively curved hips and shapely
calves. She has slender shoulders and slightly larger than average breasts. Her
face is oval and pretty, with a delicate nose and understated chin. Her lips are
lovely and blush pink and occasionally part to reveal a set of pretty teeth.
Beneath a set of arched eyebrows, her eyes are blue-green and almond-shaped. Her
mid-back length, straight hair is pale honey blonde and swept up into a thick
fall of loose curls down her back. She has oval pink fingernails.
A small enameled cerulean blue dragonfly pierces her left earlobe and a small
enameled cerulean blue dragonfly pierces her right earlobe.
 She is wearing a pink synthcotton shipsuit with a flaming star printed on the
collar and a pair of sparkly white leather clogs. She is also wearing an orange
and white blessed prayer bracelet around her wrist, a slender bracelet of tiny
tinkling silver bells around her wrist, a neon purple wrist-mounted chronometer,
a solid silver ring engraved with dragonflies, a delicate ring of silver wire
and small purple amethyst crystals, a metallic gold touch einrophone in a
metallic purple reinforced plastic phone holster, and a soft fuchsia Tardick
lizard snuggly labeled 'Asteria'. Her head, face, both eyes, both wrists, and
both hands are left uncovered.
She is carrying nothing.
